```{r Read Data}
library(readxl)
TimeSleep <- read_excel("~/Desktop/TimeSleep.xlsx")
colnames(TimeSleep)<- c('Index','Year','Period','Average Hours Per Day Sleeping','Standard Error','Type of Days','Age Group','Activity','Sex')
```

```{r Tidy Data}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(tidyr)


TimeSleep$`Average Hours Per Day Sleeping`<- as.numeric(TimeSleep$`Average Hours Per Day Sleeping`)

HoursByAge<- TimeSleep%>%
  group_by(`Age Group`)%>%
  summarize(
    Mean=mean(`Average Hours Per Day Sleeping`)
  )
HoursByAge<-HoursByAge[-2,]


```
